Asian FX bears gain momentum as hopes of early US rate cuts waneBearish bets on multiple emerging Asian currencies gained momentum as traders adjusted their bets on early rate cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve, driving investors to the safe-haven dollar, according to a Reuters poll. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 07:24:48 GMT A566GOHFIBKVHKFQ5LWDDXQQ2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/asian-fx-bears-gain-momentum-hopes-early-us-rate-cuts-wane-2024-01-25/Archishma Iyer市场宏观问题
Shein investors selling stock at 30% discount- Bloomberg NewsShein's investors are trying to sell shares in the private market at prices that value the Chinese online retailer as low as $45 billion, or a discount of around 30% to its valuation about a month back, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 07:24:12 GMT YYN7MAESVFPDZJ5OGHODNMPK3M https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/shein-investors- sell-stock-30-discount-bloomberg-news-2024-01-25/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Geopolitics, elections and policy uncertainty to weigh on China market -financial leadersAsia's top financial executives expect geopolitical tensions, the coming U.S election and Beijing's policy uncertainty to keep shaking confidence in China investment in 2024, as investors target other regional markets such as India for better returns. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 07:04:40 GMT XNT7KLHNENJSBI53FA5RMULCM4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/geopolitics-elections-policy-uncertainty-weigh-china-market-financial-leaders-2024-01-25/Selena Li, Yu Xie市场亚洲市场
Taiwan begins extended one-year conscription in response to China threatThe first batch of new recruits began serving their one-year compulsory military service in Taiwan on Thursday after the conscription period was extended from four months due to government concerns about China's rising military threat. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 06:43:08 GMT DE2T7ZMGMVJNRPJBS3K4Q63WXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-begins-extended-one-year-conscription-response-china-threat-2024-01-25/Fabian Hamacher, Ann Wang世界亚太地区
India has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives - navy chiefIndia's government has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives following a request from Male, Indian Navy Chief Admiral R. Hari Kumar told broadcaster CNN-News 18 on Thursday. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:37:51 GMT 4OK2HJTEXZJXBE3A2C737C4HJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-has-not-told-its-defence-personnel-pull-out-maldives-navy-chief-2024-01-25/Reuters世界印度
